description:
The security components of Isabel 6

The security components form the basis for the security of Isabel 6. They need to be installed prior to using Isabel 6 and their use is subject to the terms of the contract signed with Isabel SA relating to the use of Isabel 6.
These components are regularly adapted according, amongst others, to the most recent evolution of the security techniques in order to optimise the security of the transactions performed using Isabel 6.
This version contains all functionality of the previous version including the following changes:
- IsaKey compatibility with Isabel Go, Isabel Offline Reporting and Telelink 6 bugfix
